page.title: 15A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SHARON.
page.content: Usually I get up at 7.30 in the morning except for Saturdays and Sundays when I can lie on for a couple of hours more.When I get out of bed I go and get washed and changed, and then I go and make my bed.After that I go downstairs and feed my fish and have my breakfast.Then I go outside and wait for the school bus. I usually have to wait for 15 minutes until the bus comes. The bus normally comes between 8.15 and 8.30, but on Tuesdays it comes at 8.00 because we go swimming in Launceston Pool at 9.00. When the bus comes I go straight to the back because I sit in the back.It normally takes us a little more than 15 minutes to get to school.At 10.30 we have playtime and at 12.00 we have dinner. At 3.15 we get ready to go home and I go home on the bus as well. We normally get home at 3.45p.m.
